languages.text: "Мне жаль, что я не смогла разглядеть помыслов Ирлиэт сквозь призму собственных сил, Лорд-капитан. Но, кажется, теперь я начинаю понимать намерения ксеносов чуточку лучше. Их ложь, их страхи, их ярость... Цвета Ирлиэт отныне сплетаются в моих глазах нитями единого гобелена, пестрящего чуждыми эмоциями".

traits.locale_text: "Мне жаль, что я не смогла разглядеть помыслов Ирлиэт сквозь призму собственных сил, Лорд-капитан. Но, кажется, теперь я начинаю понимать намерения ксеносов чуточку лучше. Их ложь, их страхи, их ярость... Цвета Ирлиэт отныне сплетаются в моих глазах нитями единого гобелена, пестрящего чуждыми эмоциями".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "I regret that I failed to see Yrliet's designs through the prism of my own powers, Lord Captain. But now I think I'm beginning to understand the xenos' intentions a little better. Their lies, their fear, their fury... Now Yrliet's colours are woven together in my eyes into a single garish tapestry of alien emotions."
languages.original_text: "Мне жаль, что я не смогла разглядеть помыслов Ирлиэт сквозь призму собственных сил, Лорд-капитан. Но, кажется, теперь я начинаю понимать намерения ксеносов чуточку лучше. Их ложь, их страхи, их ярость... Цвета Ирлиэт отныне сплетаются в моих глазах нитями единого гобелена, пестрящего чуждыми эмоциями".

Their lies, their fear, their fury... Now Yrliet's colours are woven together in my eyes into a single garish tapestry of alien emotions."

traits.locale_text: "I regret that I failed to see Yrliet's designs through the prism of my own powers, Lord Captain. But now I think I'm beginning to understand the xenos' intentions a little better. Their lies, their fear, their fury... Now Yrliet's colours are woven together in my eyes into a single garish tapestry of alien emotions."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我很遗憾，我没能通过色彩的棱镜，看穿伊莉耶特的阴谋，舰长大人。但我猜，我现在已经能够慢慢地理解异形的意图了。我能理解他们的谎言、恐惧、怒火……如今，伊莉耶特的颜色在我看来，像是由异种情绪组成的织锦，看起来既繁复、又单一。”
languages.original_text: "I regret that I failed to see Yrliet's designs through the prism of my own powers, Lord Captain. But now I think I'm beginning to understand the xenos' intentions a little better. Their lies, their fear, their fury... Now Yrliet's colours are woven together in my eyes into a single garish tapestry of alien emotions."

traits.locale_text: “我很遗憾，我没能通过色彩的棱镜，看穿伊莉耶特的阴谋，舰长大人。但我猜，我现在已经能够慢慢地理解异形的意图了。我能理解他们的谎言、恐惧、怒火……如今，伊莉耶特的颜色在我看来，像是由异种情绪组成的织锦，看起来既繁复、又单一。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "I regret that I failed to see Yrliet's designs through the prism of my own powers, Lord Captain. But now I think I'm beginning to understand the xenos' intentions a little better. Their lies, their fear, their fury... Now Yrliet's colours are woven together in my eyes into a single garish tapestry of alien emotions."

languages.text: «Lamento que mis poderes no revelaran los designios de Yrliet, Lord Capitán. Sin embargo, creo que estoy aprendiendo a interpretar mejor las intenciones de los xenos. Sus mentiras, su miedo, su furia... Ahora los colores de Yrliet forman un tapiz estridente de emociones inhumanas ante mis ojos».
languages.original_text: "I regret that I failed to see Yrliet's designs through the prism of my own powers, Lord Captain. But now I think I'm beginning to understand the xenos' intentions a little better. Their lies, their fear, their fury... Now Yrliet's colours are woven together in my eyes into a single garish tapestry of alien emotions."

traits.locale_text: «Lamento que mis poderes no revelaran los designios de Yrliet, Lord Capitán. Sin embargo, creo que estoy aprendiendo a interpretar mejor las intenciones de los xenos. Sus mentiras, su miedo, su furia... Ahora los colores de Yrliet forman un tapiz estridente de emociones inhumanas ante mis ojos».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「私自身の力のプリズムを通して、ユリエットの計画を見抜けなかったことを後悔しています、ロード・キャプテン。ですが、今では異種族の意図が少し理解できるようになりました。彼らの嘘、恐怖、怒り…ユリエットの色彩は、私の目には異種族の感情の派手なタペストリーのように映ります」
languages.original_text: "I regret that I failed to see Yrliet's designs through the prism of my own powers, Lord Captain. But now I think I'm beginning to understand the xenos' intentions a little better. Their lies, their fear, their fury... Now Yrliet's colours are woven together in my eyes into a single garish tapestry of alien emotions."

traits.locale_text: 「私自身の力のプリズムを通して、ユリエットの計画を見抜けなかったことを後悔しています、ロード・キャプテン。ですが、今では異種族の意図が少し理解できるようになりました。彼らの嘘、恐怖、怒り…ユリエットの色彩は、私の目には異種族の感情の派手なタペストリーのように映ります」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich bereue es, dass ich Yrliets Pläne nicht durch das Prisma meiner eigenen Kräfte gesehen habe, Lord Captain. Doch ich glaube, ich verstehe die Absichten der Xenos nun ein klein wenig besser. Ihre Lügen, ihre Furcht, ihren Zorn ... Yrliets Farben sind nun in meinen Augen zu einem einzigen grellen Wandteppich der Alien-Emotionen verwoben."
languages.original_text: "I regret that I failed to see Yrliet's designs through the prism of my own powers, Lord Captain. But now I think I'm beginning to understand the xenos' intentions a little better. Their lies, their fear, their fury... Now Yrliet's colours are woven together in my eyes into a single garish tapestry of alien emotions."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bereue es, dass ich Yrliets Pläne nicht durch das Prisma meiner eigenen Kräfte gesehen habe, Lord Captain. Doch ich glaube, ich verstehe die Absichten der Xenos nun ein klein wenig besser. Ihre Lügen, ihre Furcht, ihren Zorn ... Yrliets Farben sind nun in meinen Augen zu einem einzigen grellen Wandteppich der Alien-Emotionen verwoben."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Je regrette que mes pouvoirs ne m'aient pas permis de voir ce qu'Yrliet avait en tête, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Mais maintenant, je crois que je commence à comprendre un peu mieux les intentions des xénos. Leurs mensonges, leur peur, leur fureur... Maintenant, à mes yeux, les couleurs d'Yrliet sont entrelacées les unes dans les autres pour former une grande tapisserie d'émotions étrangères. »
languages.original_text: "I regret that I failed to see Yrliet's designs through the prism of my own powers, Lord Captain. But now I think I'm beginning to understand the xenos' intentions a little better. Their lies, their fear, their fury... Now Yrliet's colours are woven together in my eyes into a single garish tapestry of alien emotions."

traits.locale_text: « Je regrette que mes pouvoirs ne m'aient pas permis de voir ce qu'Yrliet avait en tête, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Mais maintenant, je crois que je commence à comprendre un peu mieux les intentions des xénos. Leurs mensonges, leur peur, leur fureur... Maintenant, à mes yeux, les couleurs d'Yrliet sont entrelacées les unes dans les autres pour former une grande tapisserie d'émotions étrangères. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Kendi güçlerimin prizması üzerinden Yrliet'in entrikalarını göremediğim için üzgünüm Lord Kaptan. Gelgelelim artık zenoların gayelerini daha iyi anlamaya başladığımı düşünüyorum. Yalanları, korkuları, öfkeleri... Artık Yrliet'in renklerini, yabancı duygularla tek parça hâlinde dokunmuş cırtlak bir el işi olarak görüyorum."
languages.original_text: "I regret that I failed to see Yrliet's designs through the prism of my own powers, Lord Captain. But now I think I'm beginning to understand the xenos' intentions a little better. Their lies, their fear, their fury... Now Yrliet's colours are woven together in my eyes into a single garish tapestry of alien emotions."

traits.locale_text: "Kendi güçlerimin prizması üzerinden Yrliet'in entrikalarını göremediğim için pişmanım Lord Kaptan. Gelgelelim artık zenoların gayelerini daha iyi anlamaya başladım sanırım. Yalanları, korkuları, öfkeleri... Artık Yrliet'in renklerini, uzaylı duygularıyla tek parça hâlinde dokunmuş ve cırtlak bir el işi olarak görüyorum."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
